alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an acetamide group conjugated to a phenyl group, which is in turn ortho-substituted with a halogen atom.
alternative_parents.name: O-haloacetanilides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an acetamide group conjugated to a phenyl group, which is in turn para-substituted with a halogen atom.
alternative_parents.name: P-haloacetanilides

alternative_parents.description: Benzoic acids carrying a halogen atom on the benzene ring.
alternative_parents.name: Halobenzoic acids

alternative_parents.description: Benzoic acids carrying a halogen atom at the 4-position of the benzene ring.
alternative_parents.name: 4-halobenzoic acids

alternative_parents.description: Benzoic acids carrying a halogen atom at the 2-position of the benzene ring.
alternative_parents.name: 2-halobenzoic acids

alternative_parents.description: Acetamides where one or more amide hydrogens is substituted by an aryl group.
alternative_parents.name: N-acetylarylamines

alternative_parents.description: Organic Compounds containing a benzene ring which bears at least one carboxyl group.
alternative_parents.name: Benzoic acids

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a carboxamido substituent attached to a benzene ring.
alternative_parents.name: Benzamides

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing an N-acyethanolamine moiety, which is characterized by an acyl group is linked to the nitrogen atom of ethanolamine.
alternative_parents.name: N-acylethanolamines

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an acyl moiety of benzoic acid with the formula (C6H5CO-).
alternative_parents.name: Benzoyl derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Aromatic compounds containing 1 carboxyl group and a C-X (X = halogen) group at adjacent positions of an aromatic ring.
alternative_parents.name: 1-carboxy-2-haloaromatic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Aromatic compounds containing one or more iodine atoms attached to a benzene.
alternative_parents.name: Iodobenzenes

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the acyl iodide functional group.
alternative_parents.name: Aryl iodides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a halogen atom, which is indirectly attached to a carbonyl via an intervening vinyl (>C=C<) moiety.
alternative_parents.name: Vinylogous halides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds with the general formula RNHC(=O)CH3, where R= organyl group.
alternative_parents.name: Acetamides

alternative_parents.description: Ionic derivatives of carboxylic acid.
alternative_parents.name: Carboxylic acid salts

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a secondary carboxylic acid amide functional group, with the general structure RC(=O)N(R')H (R,R'=alkyl, aryl).
alternative_parents.name: Secondary carboxylic acid amides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing metals and halogens. Some are ionic while others are covalently bonded.
alternative_parents.name: Organic metal halides

alternative_parents.description: Carboxylic acids containing exactly one carboxyl groups.
alternative_parents.name: Monocarboxylic acids and derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a bond between carbon a pnictogen atom. Pnictogens are p-block element atoms that are in the group 15 of the periodic table.
alternative_parents.name: Organopnictogen compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds comprising the primary alcohol functional group, with the general structure RCOH (R=alkyl, aryl).
alternative_parents.name: Primary alcohols

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an oxide group.
alternative_parents.name: Organic oxides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a sodium ion.
alternative_parents.name: Organic sodium salts

alternative_parents.description: Organic neutral compounds having formal unit electrical charges of opposite sign.
alternative_parents.name: Organic zwitterions

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a chemical bond between a carbon atom and an iodine atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organoiodides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a carbonyl group, with the general structure RC(=O)R', where R=organyl, R'=H, N, O, organyl group or halide group.
alternative_parents.name: Carbonyl compounds

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

class.description: Aromatic compounds containing one monocyclic ring system consisting of benzene.
class.name: Benzene and substituted derivatives

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as acylaminobenzoic acid and derivatives. These are derivatives of amino benzoic acid derivatives where the amine group is N-acylated.

direct_parent.description: Derivatives of amino benzoic acid derivatives where the amine group is N-acylated.
direct_parent.name: Acylaminobenzoic acid and derivatives

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Organic compounds containing a carboxylic acid substituent attached to a benzene ring.
subclass.name: Benzoic acids and derivatives

superclass.description: Aromatic compounds containing one or more benzene rings.
superclass.name: Benzenoids
